description: Scholarship mission: To provide scholarships to Incoming Freshmen & Transfer students who plan to major in majors that support Oklahoma's Workforce Development needs. Eligibility Requirements Complete the Incoming Student Qualifying Application Must be an Incoming Freshman or transfer student Must have graduated from an Oklahoma high school Minimum 2.5 GPA Must be enrolled full-time Must be working either part-time or full-time during college Must be majoring in OK Workforce Development needs with preference given to Engineering, Nursing, and Teacher Education Students Must write a 250-word essay describing work plans while attending college, along with degree pursuing and why This scholarship is available to apply for during the Incoming Student scholarship period.
